original_text: He must not make himself unclean for people related to him by marriage, and so defile himself.
korean_text: 제사장은 그의 백성의 어른인즉 자신을 더럽혀 속되게 하지 말지니라

sentences.original_text: He must not make himself unclean
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신을 부정하게 만들어서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: for people related to him by marriage
